channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.description:
Report X-2024031373

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found Leaking during unload placed in a red hazmat bin and brought to Qa DescribePack: Loose cap and bottles in box where upside down DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a hazmat bin and promptly brought to Qa

item.title: Report X-2024031332
item.description:
Report X-2024031332

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found wet and the whole side of it is ripped open. The box was put in a lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: The whole side ripped open allowing the 4X1 gallon bottles to fall out. The inside of the box is wet from the leaking 1X1 Gallon bottle of Branson GP Formulated Cleaning Concentrate. The duration of release was about a minute. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The box and bottles were put in a lined hazmat tote in the upright position and sent to QA.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found with the bottom of the box leaking white powder out of it. The box was placed in a lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: The bottom of the pail inside the box has a 10 inch crack along the bottom of it. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed in a lined hazmat tote.

item.title: Report X-2024031294
item.description:
Report X-2024031294

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-20
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was unloaded from the trailer and was noted as being wet. It obviously had been on its side at some point. These type of Jerricans only leak if punctured or lying on their side. This one wasn't punctured. It was set to the side for inspection once it was noted to have internal leakage. DescribePack: Leakage from the cap DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: The package was brought to the side and stood up properly.

item.title: Report X-2024031210
item.description:
Report X-2024031210

  • City: WILLINGTON

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found with the side of it wet. The box was put in a lined hazmat tote in the upright position and sent to QA. DescribePack: 3 X 1 gallon bottles of Delimer have the seal under the caps broken allowing the bottles to leak. The duration of release was about 15 minutes. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The box weas put in a lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Technician arrive on site for No Heat at a brand new customers home. Tech found oil leaking from old oil tank, A new tank has since been installed. The old oil tank in in a crawl space below the home and has a slow active leak. The homeowner is aware and seeking assistance from the State of Ct.

item.title: Report X-2024030759
item.description:
Report X-2024030759

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-09
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package came down the shoot in the load area wet. The package was put into an unlined tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: 1 X 12oz can of Enamel spray has a small hole on the bottom of it. The hole allowed 12oz of paint to leak out into the box is less then 5 minutes. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The box was put into an unlined tote.
